item.title: That's What Love Looks Like
item.description:
There was so much hate these last days in the internet that I decided to talk about a day which was about love.

Correction: I am not actually talking. I'm showing some of my pictures.

The (legendary) People's Climate March, which happened a couple of weeks ago in NYC,filled my veins with hope. No words are able to express what each of these pictures say.

The rest of the pictures (and in larger resolution) are here (flickr) or here (behance). Peace.
item.dc:creator: bt3gl
